analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x6b0f6038c7c2d9e9ed89a87c1f100579fbe46373.sol:
	Contract MBCH has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0f6038c7c2d9e9ed89a87c1f100579fbe46373.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0f6038c7c2d9e9ed89a87c1f100579fbe46373.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
